posts.post_content:
I promise I'm not trying to hijack this thread, but your cabinet would certainly look pretty good coupled up with mine:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=245391[/url]

I had no idea there were other similar Buffalo Bisons cabinets out there until you posted this!

Edited to add that your cabinet is almost certainly also from 1878 as the Hornell team disbanded on 8/21/1878, shortly after their July 6th loss to the Buffalo Bisons (noted on your cab).
Great cards guys! Here is the team:

Never a problem adding to the conversation; enjoy the show.
jim
